Common.name: Project Name
Common.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: Register and modify basic information for all sales projects, and manage the overall status of projects.
Projects.getStarted: Get started by creating a new project.
Projects.name: Project Name

Contracts.title: Contracts
Contracts.description: Manage sales contracts, draft agreements, handle down payments, and finalize the sales process.

Lottery.title: Lottery System
Lottery.description: Manage the lottery process for applicants, select winners, and assign units.

Units.title: Unit Inventory
Units.description: Register unit information for each building and manage details such as price, area, and status (available, reserved, contracted).

Payments.title: Payments
Payments.description: Process payments according to the contract schedule. Managers record and view payment information upon receipt retrieval from buyers.

Birdseye.title: Bird's Eye View
Birdseye.description: Visually inspect the entire complex and intuitively grasp the sales status of each block and unit.

Leads.title: Leads
Leads.description: Register and manage potential customer information, track consultation history, and manage status changes to lead to actual contracts.

Reservations.title: Reservations
Reservations.description: Manage applications for specific units by interested customers and handle pre-contract stages.

Blocks.title: Blocks
Blocks.description: Manage block information within the project.

Buildings.title: Buildings
Buildings.description: Manage detailed information for buildings within each block.

ImportExport.title: Import/Export
ImportExport.description: Admin screen for bulk data registration or backup via CSV import/export.
